engine.util.menu

Class MenuStack

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.util.menu.MenuStack

  • public class MenuStack
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a complete menu system.
    Author:
    Benny Bobaganoosh (thebennybox@gmail.com)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MenuStack(SpriteSheet font, Color fontColor, Color selectionColor, double offsetX, double offsetY, double scale, IButton upKey, IButton downKey, IButton activateKey, IButton toggleKey, double usageDelayLength, Menu defaultMenu)
      Creates a new MenuStack.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MenuStack

        public MenuStack(SpriteSheet font,
         Color fontColor,
         Color selectionColor,
         double offsetX,
         double offsetY,
         double scale,
         IButton upKey,
         IButton downKey,
         IButton activateKey,
         IButton toggleKey,
         double usageDelayLength,
         Menu defaultMenu)
        Creates a new MenuStack.
        Parameters:
        font - The font to render text with.
        fontColor - The color to use for normal menu options.
        selectionColor - The color to use for the currently selected menu option.
        offsetX - The location, on X, to begin rendering at.
        offsetY - The location, on Y, to begin rendering at.
        scale - How large each character of text should be.
        upKey - The button that moves the menu up.
        downKey - The button that moves the menu down.
        activateKey - The button that activates the menu.
        toggleKey - The button that can either bring the menu up, or go back a level.
        usageDelayLength - The minimum time between doing something with the menu.
        defaultMenu - The initial level of the Menu.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes out of the menu entirely.

      • toggleVisibility

        public void toggleVisibility()
        If a menu is open, go back a level. If no menu is open, open the default menu.

      • update

        public void update(double delta)
        Updates the MenuStack.
        Parameters:
        delta - Amount of time passed since last update.

      • pop

        public void pop()
        Goes back a menu level.

      • push

        public void push(Menu menu)
        Add a new menu level.
        Parameters:
        menu - The new menu to add.

      • render

        public void render(IRenderContext target)
        Render the current menu.
        Parameters:
        target - The render context to draw the menu with.

      • isShowing

        public boolean isShowing()
        Whether or not a menu is currently open.
        Returns:
        True if a menu is open, false other wise.
